trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of input that the grammar, defined by the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />, will match.
trans-unit.target: Indica il tipo di input con cui la grammatica, definita dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />, eseguirà la corrispondenza.

trans-unit.source: The input mode for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> is determined by its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La modalità di input per un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> è determinato dal relativo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The default input mode is Voice, which indicates that the grammar defined by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> will match speech input.
trans-unit.target: La modalità di input predefinita è vocali, che indica che la grammatica definito tramite il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> corrisponderà input vocale.

trans-unit.source: The Dtmf mode indicates that a grammar will match Dual-Tone Multi-Frequency (DTMF) tones instead of speech.
trans-unit.target: La modalità Dtmf indica che una grammatica verrà corrisponde toni DTMF Dual tono Multi-Frequency (DTMF) invece di riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: There are 16 DTMF tones, 12 of which are commonly found on most telephones.
trans-unit.target: Esistono 16 toni DTMF, 12 di cui vengono in genere individuati nella maggior parte dei telefoni.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object will match the type of input specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property, which gets an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> dell'oggetto da un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> oggetto corrisponderà al tipo di input specificato dal <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> proprietà, che ottiene un'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object will match DTMF tones similar to those found on a telephone, instead of speech.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> corrisponderà ai toni DTMF simili a quelli individuati in un telefono, anziché alla voce.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object will match speech input.
